benchmark_details.name: FAUN-Eval (Fine-grained Issue Solving Capabilities Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: FAUN-Eval is a benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the Fine-grained Issue Solving capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) across three distinct tasks: Question Answering (QA), Fault Localization, and Code Editing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate the atomic capabilities of LLMs in solving real-world GitHub issues in software engineering tasks.

data.source: Curated from 30 well-known GitHub repositories with issue and pull request data.
data.annotation: Data curated through cross-referencing and keyword verification methods.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using the predictions from models compared against the ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores across metrics indicate better performance in the corresponding tasks.
methodology.validation: Models evaluated against ground truth for accuracy in QA, fault localization, and code editing.
